GSD.description:
media: pvrusb2: fix memory leak in pvr_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.327 by commit 2fe46195d2f0d5d09ea65433aefe47a4d0d0ff4d. For more details please see the references link.
